code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{LeftPart}from'../home';import blogImage from"../../assets/images/web.svg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=()=>{const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchPosts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("https://dev.to/api/articles?username=milutin_stefanovic_813404&per_page=3");const json=await response.json();setPosts(json);setLoading(false);}catch(error){setError("Failed to fetch posts.");setLoading(false);}};fetchPosts();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LeftPart,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"service",className:"kioto_tm_section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"kioto_tm_service",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"kioto_tm_title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"// My Blogs"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"services_list",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list_inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"svg",src:blogImage,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"title",children:"Check out my latest blog posts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:post.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:post.title})]})},post.id))})})]})]})]});};export default Blog;
